name: Brionne

evolution.description: Brionne can evolve into Primarina at level 13 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Pop Star Pokémon. It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Liquid Voice
abilities.description: Any sound-based move activated by this Pokémon is water-type.
